name: Redead
description:
Font made by Shubert Dias, the rest made by me

How long can you survive when the dead are coming.

shoot the dead collect ammo health and strenght your shoots in this Shoot em up made by Denis the coder of heartbit.

Redead is a small Fixed shooter that i made with the simple wish to finish something that wasn't game jam related (and to distract me while my sister made the assets for the game that is in the make) and the result came at this, simple but well made (for my skills as an artist) .

There is a bug with the audio in godot web, if you are a linux user please download the game, the audio must syncronize there.
